00087 #ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
00088 #include "config.h"
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 #include "LRU_List.h"
00092 #include "log_functions.h"
00093 #include "HashData.h"
00094 #include "HashTable.h"
00095 #include "fsal.h"
00096 #include "cache_inode.h"
00097 #include "stuff_alloc.h"
00098 
00099 #include <unistd.h>
00100 #include <sys/types.h>
00101 #include <sys/param.h>
00102 #include <time.h>
00103 #include <pthread.h>
00104 
00123 cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_getattr( cache_entry_t        * pentry, 
00124                                           fsal_attrib_list_t   * pattr, 
00125                                           hash_table_t         * ht,  /* Unused, kept for protototype's homogeneity */
00126                                           cache_inode_client_t * pclient, 
00127                                           fsal_op_context_t    * pcontext, 
00128                                           cache_inode_status_t * pstatus )
00129 {
00130   fsal_handle_t     * pfsal_handle ;
00131   fsal_status_t       fsal_status ;
00132 
00133   /* sanity check */
00134   if( pentry == NULL || pattr == NULL || ht == NULL || pclient == NULL || pcontext == NULL )
00135     {
00136       *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00137       return *pstatus ;
00138     }
00139 
00140   /* Set the return default to CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS */
00141   *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00142 
00143   /* stats */
00144   pclient->stat.nb_call_total += 1 ;
00145   pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_call[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1 ;
00146   
00147   /* Lock the entry */
00148   P( pentry->lock ) ;
00149   if( cache_inode_renew_entry( pentry, pattr, ht, pclient, pcontext, pstatus ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00150     {
00151       V( pentry->lock ) ;
00152       pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1 ;
00153       return *pstatus ;
00154     }
00155 
00156   cache_inode_get_attributes( pentry, pattr ) ;
00157     
00158   if( FSAL_TEST_MASK( pattr->asked_attributes, FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR ) )
00159     {
00160        switch( pentry->internal_md.type )
00161         {
00162         case REGULAR_FILE:
00163           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.file.handle ;
00164           break ;
00165           
00166         case SYMBOLIC_LINK:
00167           pfsal_handle  = &pentry->object.symlink.handle ;
00168           break ;
00169           
00170         case DIR_BEGINNING:
00171           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00172           break ;
00173           
00174         case DIR_CONTINUE:
00175           /* lock the related dir_begin (dir begin are garbagge collected AFTER their related dir_cont)
00176            * this means that if a DIR_CONTINUE exists, its pdir pointer is not endless */
00177           P( pentry->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00178           pfsal_handle =  &pentry->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->object.dir_begin.handle ;
00179           V( pentry->object.dir_cont.pdir_begin->lock ) ;
00180           break ;
00181           
00182         case SOCKET_FILE:
00183         case FIFO_FILE:
00184         case BLOCK_FILE:
00185         case CHARACTER_FILE:
00186           pfsal_handle = &pentry->object.special_obj.handle ;
00187           break ;
00188           
00189         }
00190        
00191        /* An error occured when trying to get the attributes, they have to be renewed */
00192        fsal_status = FSAL_getattrs( pfsal_handle, pcontext, pattr ) ;
00193        if( FSAL_IS_ERROR( fsal_status ) ) 
00194          {
00195            *pstatus = cache_inode_error_convert( fsal_status ) ;
00196            V( pentry->lock ) ;
00197 
00198            if( fsal_status.major == ERR_FSAL_STALE ) 
00199             {
00200                 cache_inode_status_t kill_status ;
00201 
00202                 DisplayLog( "cache_inode_getattr: Stale FSAL File Handle detected for pentry = %p", pentry ) ;
00203 
00204                 if( cache_inode_kill_entry( pentry, ht, pclient, &kill_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00205                     DisplayLog( "cache_inode_getattr: Could not kill entry %p, status = %u", pentry, kill_status ) ;
00206 
00207                 *pstatus = CACHE_INODE_FSAL_ESTALE ;
00208             }
00209            
00210           /* stat */
00211            pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_unrecover[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1  ;
00212 
00213            return *pstatus ;
00214          }
00215        
00216        /* Set the new attributes */
00217        cache_inode_set_attributes( pentry, pattr ) ;
00218     }
00219  
00220   *pstatus = cache_inode_valid( pentry, CACHE_INODE_OP_GET, pclient ) ;
00221   
00222   V( pentry->lock ) ;
00223 
00224   /* stat */
00225   if( *pstatus != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00226     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_err_retryable[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1 ;
00227   else
00228     pclient->stat.func_stats.nb_success[CACHE_INODE_GETATTR] += 1 ;
00229   
00230   return *pstatus ;
00231 } /* cache_inode_getattr */
Generated on Wed Apr 9 08:24:52 2008 for Cache inode layer by  1.3.9.1
